email.subject: Last Chance: Join Europe’s Only Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER 2025)

body.call_to_action: Eager to expand your expertise and make a greater impact in Informatics Education? Join Europe's Only Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER 2025)!
body.application_deadline: Applications remain open until July 11th or until all spots are filled.

program_details.description: Building on the success of its inaugural edition last year, SCHIER 2025 offers a week of:
highlights: Expert-led lectures and interactive sessions on key topics and methodologies.
Collaborative discussions on emerging research challenges.
Networking opportunities that foster meaningful, long-term collaboration and advancement.
Special Presentation on 'Education in Quantum Computing' by Fabio Scafirimuto, IBM Quantum Education and Workforce Development EMEA Team Lead.

event.who_should_attend: PhD students, postdocs, and researchers with an interest in Informatics Education Research

body.closing: Let's join dedicated experts and researchers shaping the future of Informatics Education in Europe!
body.remark: Informatics Education is a growing and vital field recognised by the EU Council.
